p: We used four bioclimatic variables in our ENMs (mean annual rainfall and variability, average temperature of the warmest and coldest months) because they represent the major drivers of species diversity in large spatial scales (see Hawkings, Porter, & Diniz‚ÄêFilho, 2003). We obtained data on bioclimatic variables from the World Climate Research Program's (WCRP) Coupled Model Intercomparison Project phase 3 (CMIP3) multimodel dataset (Meehl et al., 2007; https://www.esgf-node.llnl.gov).
